content.rendered:
With the Kenyan government tightening policies on Sports betting, more companies have come up to offer excellent betting services to players. Bungabet is a trustworthy betting company based in neighboring Uganda, and also enjoys membership here in Kenya. If you are a player looking for an excellent iGaming site, you have come to the right place. Below is a guide that will inform you of everything you need to know about how the platform works, how to make deposits and withdrawals, and what kinds of games to expect.

What is Bungabet?

Bungabet is Kenya’s new sports betting provider that ensures great gambling experiences by providing various games and events. In addition to the usual sports and live matches, Bungabet offers virtual games that will excite you. Slots fans haven’t been left behind. Check out the different types of online slots machines you can access at any time. Examples include classic slots, video slots, megaways, and so much more. The site also provides lottery games, cards, scratch games, video bingo, mini-games, skills games, and casual games, just to mention a few. There is something for everyone. You won’t miss your favorite game here.

How to register at Bungabet?

You can access Bungabet through their site, or by downloading its app from Google Play Store. Visit their website, bungabet.co.ke, for a quick registration process. Click on the Register button on the screen and provide your data, such as names and phone numbers.  Opening a Bungabet account is free of charge, and you will not be obliged to pay anything. As long as you are 18+ years old and take note of all the registration requirements, your account will be ready. Use it to manage all your bets.

How to make deposits?

The process is speedy, and the minimum you can deposit is Kshs.20, and the maximum is Kshs.300,000. Follow these steps:

  • Deposit money in your MPESA account
  • Log in to the website.
  • Click Deposit
  • Enter amount
  • Confirm by clicking OK.
  • Since your user account is linked to your phone number, the money will automatically be subtracted from your MPESA and reflect on the betting site.
  • You will receive a confirmation message once the deposit is complete.
  • Ready to play with real money

How to make withdrawals?

To withdraw your earnings;

  • Click the Withdraw button.
  • Choose the preferred method, i.e., MPESA
  • Enter amount
  • Confirm transaction
  • You’ll instantly get an SMS confirming the amount sent to your phone number’s MPESA

How to make use of the 100% welcome Bonus?

It’s always advisable to go through a betting site’s terms and conditions to understand the rules of how you can play. These sites have guidelines that may not be similar to each other. For instance, rules on bonuses and how to earn them differ from one site to another.

Bungabet wants players to enjoy their betting experience and explore the various games on the sites by offering a bonus. To get this bonus, you’ll have to place a minimum bet of 3.00 odds on your deposit. If you win, you’ll receive a free bet of about Kshs.500. You may have to wager this bonus before withdrawing the winnings.

Learn more about ScorePesa

Why choose Bungabet?

  • Easy registration process
  • Instant deposits and withdrawals
  • Transparency
  • Safe and secure
  • Wide variety of sports and gaming events such as soccer, basketball, hockey
  • Bets on live games
  • Slots
  • Players can use mobile phone to access the site
  • Bungabet app is available for download

Types of Bets and How to Play.

To place a bet on this site, check the screen’s left side for a column of all available games and events. For instance, if interested in football, you can select matches that are available that specific day, live games currently going on, or check the table that lists games according to the type of league. (Seria A, Bundesliga, Premium League, La Liga, etc.)

Note that there are three ways of placing a bet;

  • Single – One prediction
  • Express – two or more predictions
  • Chain  – three or more predictions

First, log in then select the match you would like to place a bet. This action will open the bet slip feature. Enter the stake and check the potential win amount. Once you click Ok, your bet becomes active. You can always follow the progress of your bets by checking the bet slip. It has information about all your wins and losses. 

Get more knowledge of how Betsafi Works

Summary.

Bungabet has a lot to offer for betting fanatics who want to stay updated with all the on-going sports events worldwide. You can always try virtual betting or play slots for a more thrilling experience. It has a simple registration process and offers safe and secure payment methods, making it one of Kenya’s best sports betting sites.
